```{python, eval = F, echo = T}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd
df = pd.DataFrame(
  np.random.randn(1000, 4), columns=["A", "B", "C", "D"]
  )
df = df.cumsum()
plt.figure()
df.plot()
plt.legend(loc='best')
```
